Nelani Fernando 
 
            PROFILE 

REFEREES  

University of Moratuwa (2014-2018) 
BSc (Hons) in Information Technology

Holy Family Convent Wennappuwa (2001-2012) 
G.C.E. Advanced Level in Physical Science Stream in English medium 
2013- Result: 2 B’s 1 C 

 

 

Trainee Software Engineer at 
strataNEXTGEN pty ltd. 
(oct 2017- march 2018) 
 
Technologies used: MSSQL, JavaScript, 
Ajax, HTML, CSS, T-SQL, Framework 7 

 

 Python, Java, C, PHP 

 MySQL, MSSQL 

 Image Processing 

 HTML, CSS, JavaScript 

 Eclipse, NetBeans, PyCharm 

 Software requirement Modelling 

 
An enthusiastic individual in the field of Information Technology with strong 
interpersonal, team working and communication skills in pursuit of an 
opportunity to utilize and enhance capabilities and willing to work in dynamic 
environments while making a positive contribution to the organization. 
 

(+94)779501671 

308/1 ,Borel la  rd,Wennappuwa  
 
l inkedin.c om/in/nelani/  
 
nelanifdo@gmail.com 
 

             EDUCATION 

EXPERIENCE 

            TECHNICAL SKILLS 

 

              PROJECTS 

Identify and find the impact of a Social media trend using Trend 
Analysis techniques. (Ongoing Research) 
A model to effectively identify a twitter trend using topic modelling 
techniques and sentiment analysis of the trend by considering text, 
emoticons and images with respect to the trend is carried out. Then 
the particular trend is identified in news media if available and the 
impact of the trend is calculated. 
Technologies used: Python, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Image 
Processing, MySQL, Bootstrap 
 

Freelancer system for differently abled (Level 2) 
Web and mobile platform where differently abled people and donors 
and make profiles and communicate with each other to donate and 
buy/sell products 
Technologies used: MSSQL, HTML, C#, Bootstrap, Android studio  
 

Automated Pol roti maker (Level 1) 
Microcontroller based hardware project that allows to automate the 
process of making pol rotis. 
Technologies used: C, Atmega 32, ATMEL studio  

 

 Documentation and Specification 
skills 

 Software development 
methodologies (Agile SCRUM) 

 

NON T ECHNICA L  SKI LL S  

 Interpersonal Skills 

 Communication Skills 

 Analytical Skills 

 Managerial and leadership Skills 

 Quick Learning ability 

 Languages (English, Sinhala) 

             PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATIONS

Chartered Institute of Management Accounting (CIMA)  

Business Analyst
